QuestData.Title: Field Experiment
QuestData.Description:
Thanks to you, our geological survey is now operating at nearly 96% efficiency!
<LOU-C furrows her eyebrows.>
Those are rookie numbers.
Help me run the samples you collected through my Geoscanner 289-07. It should give us a baseline as to what exactly is going on at the plateau.
QuestData.LogDescription: Help LOU-C run her tests in Whaler's Nook.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Talk to LOU-C Fitzcog in Whaler's Nook.
QuestData.RewardText: They say to expect the unexpected, but wow... this is unprecedented!
